title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 400.8 - Cost of annual review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 400.8 - Cost of annual review

State Regulations

The expense of each annual review required pursuant to section
11 (e)
of the Tax Law shall be borne and paid by the certified capital company. The cost of the annual review shall consist of all actual expenses incurred, including reimbursement for the compensation paid for the services of the persons employed or contracted by the superintendent to make such review. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
